Name: Lorethem
About the game: A small, third-person adventure game with action elements and a marvel atmosphere of magic world. The plot is pretty simple - wizard's apprentice attempting to save his teacher from the evil threat and it's up to you to help him on his way. Key Features Beautiful fabulous game design, as well as sounds and music. Funny NPCs. Some light puzzles and platforming. Lots of hidden treasures. Learning a new spells/upgrades by collecting Magic Tomes. Collect as many gold coins as possible to get higher scores.
Meta Title: Lorethem: May 25, 2022, Boris Naftaliev and Full Overview
